name: CavernNauts Alpha [Demo]
description:
A 2D multi-class platformer where you explore caverns in search of treasures. Make use of the 3 playable characters to swing, swim and explode your way through the caverns, but watch out, you only have a small amount of time to get in and get your treasure! 

Winner of Irelands Imagine Cup Finals, made by 2 student from LIT Tipperary in a few short weeks.

Hope you have fun ;)

CavernNauts no longer needs an Xbox Controller. play with mouse and keyboard now, just download the extra Zip file!

Tweet #CavernNauts if you enjoyed the game. We'd love to know :)

Patch notes:
>Added Pause Menu.

>rewrote dialog system.

>Made dialog pause the game, so players do not miss key tutorial segments .

>Moved and modified several dialog trigger points through levels.

>Added extra coins to hub world.

>added dialog triggers outside unlock doors


---------------------------------------------------

>Dialog no longer pauses game, but takes the form of an interact-able sign

-----------------------------------------------------

Ported to mouse and keyboard, added extra zip.
